<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules"> <x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection/> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Nodes can only have one child</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if (current.getRecordClassName() == "sys_cb_outcome" || current.getRecordClassName() == "sys_cb_decision") return;
//collectors can have multiple parents but that is a different field var ONLY_ONE_PARENT = gs.getMessage("Another record already has this parent. Each record can only be the parent of one other record. Please choose a different parent and resubmit.");
var parent = current.getValue("parent"); var node = new GlideRecord("sys_cb_node"); node.addQuery("parent", parent); node.addQuery("topic_goal", current.getValue("topic_goal")); node.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", current.getValue("sys_id")); node.query();
if (node.hasNext()) { gs.addInfoMessage(ONLY_ONE_PARENT); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-09-21 07:53:34</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>04bc6c9983701210c6695855eeaad31a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Nodes can only have one child</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Now Utils" source="x_938076_now_utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Now Utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules_04bc6c9983701210c6695855eeaad31a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-09-21 07:53:34</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=04bc6c9983701210c6695855eeaad31a"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Nodes can only have one child
